website_summaries.verdict: Financial responsibility laws for drivers often make dashcams superfluous, but if one makes sense in your driving climate, the Thinkware Dash Cam X500 not only reliably records collision footage but offers a few extras that might come in handy, such as speed camera warnings.
pros: The Thinkware Dash Cam X500 automatically records and saves driving and collision footage using a wide lens and HD video
GPS encoding on the video lets you see precisely where incidents occurred
A built-in speed and red-light camera database lets the device alert drivers to traffic safety infrastructure
cons: The driver assistance features, such as the forward collision warning, trigger too easily to be useful
The viewer software lacks an easy interface for selecting among available video footage

customer_reviews.title: Works well but has some features I do not like. Red Light warning are in meters instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but has some features I do not like. Red Light warning are in meters instead of feet and cannot be changed. Parking monitoring will not work unless unit is permanently attached to ignition power - parking will not work off cameral internal battery. Had unit professionally mounted to avoid dangling wires on 2015 vehicle which cost almost as much as the unit itself. However it does look nice and integrated with rest of windshield electronics. Had to use a tiny drop of adhesive to secure rotation of bracket so unit would not move when handled. Tightening screw adjustment will not totally prevent rotation.
customer_reviews.author: GymW

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great quality. Someone crossed their line and into my lane sideswiping me, and tried telling their insurance company they weren't sure they were the ones who were at fault. I'd probably be SOL if I didn't have this camera. Definitely worth the money as the repair bill totaled almost $3,000!
customer_reviews.author: Yale G.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This camera is garbage. It overheats constantly and reboots. Thinkware will not honor the warranty and plays games with you that creates delays and frustration. Their customer service blames the end user for the malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cameras butler Wifi model would've been better
customer_reviews.text: Video quality and PC software are good. Wifi model would've been better, but it's more pricey. The orientation of the cameras caused me some confusion. For example rear cam's lateral orientation seems flipped when we view on touch screen. But on PC viewer it made sense. As an improvement boty cameras proper Orientation should be well documented.
customer_reviews.author: Raghavendra Bhat N K

customer_reviews.title: Parking mode is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I use cellink battery for parking every day i find parking mode turned off after 4-5 hour i tried to fix it by changing the settings i.e by turning off low voltage shutdown, timer shutdown still parking mode stop working after 5 hours. My old cam x500 parking mode never failed me once straight for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: tebmenja

customer_reviews.title: Over The Road Trucker.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the X700 front and rear cam package deal, my mother has had the x500 for a few years now with no issues and very happy with it. The quality of the cameras is outstanding, couldn’t be happier. I setup my rear cam as a blind spot cam in my rear side window of my 18 wheeler. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Keith O

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! I had a Vantrue and Transcend before ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for several months now and use it daily. I LOVE IT! I had a Vantrue and Transcend before had failures with both. Not matter where you are on the financial grid, buy this or a Thinkware and save yourself the hassle install and removals from failures from cheaper dash cams. This will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: get one
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of research. Cannot beat features for the price. Everything was good quality and easy to install. The camera angles of both front and rear cameras really suprised me. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: X700
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the camera is fairly forthcoming and easy to assemble and use. The only problem that cost me additional $$ was that the camera did not come with enough wire to hook up the rear camera on an SUV that will cost you to purchase the extension. It advertised Wi/Fi which this model does not have. Dennis
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: Solid Dash Cam. Superior picture. Great mounting - no rubber suction cups
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Wellington Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fun Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: Great and fun dash cam. Irritates the wife with warnings and notices, but this helps let you know what is happening.
customer_reviews.author: Yuman99

customer_reviews.title: I feel much better having this
customer_reviews.text: I haven't needed the footage yet, but after a hit-and-run in the beginning of 2016, I feel much better having this. The video quality is exceptional. I recommend getting the rear-view camera as well. And the hardwiring cable (not included) allows it to run in parking mode, so if someone hits my car while it's parked, the motion sensor and impact sensor turn the camera on.
customer_reviews.author: Ophia

customer_reviews.title: The clear picture
customer_reviews.text: The recordings are very clear, but it don't sent the pictures to my phone like I though
customer_reviews.author: luetishia

customer_reviews.title: Install easy
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for SUV. It took about one hour for installation and very easy.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera
customer_reviews.text: Video and audio quality are above average. Mounting system sucks. Once it's placed on the window it's there for good. Doesn't rotate or swivel like other competitors. Packaged nicely. I like it enough that I bought a second one for my wife's jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... eject this is the 3rd time trying and would like a
customer_reviews.text: the sd card wont eject this is the 3rd time trying and would like a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but no wifi
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th car I have equipped with a think ware camera. While this is a good camera it does no have wifi. I didnt realize this until after I had it hardwired and cables hidden
customer_reviews.author: texas rebal

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is superb! Gets the job done even during low light instances.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Chahin

customer_reviews.title: Clear Video
customer_reviews.text: Brought one for my wife’s car and then added one in my car. Works very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera thus far
customer_reviews.text: Great camera thus far. Only things I can see that would improve to 5 star would be wifi access and/or ability to change settings from the camera.
customer_reviews.author: kman65

customer_reviews.title: This manufacturer  is a very popular company for this item
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice. I bought cobra at Costco before but it did not work after a week, so I returned it. This brand is very easy to use and the initial sound indicate when this machine start to work. I heard that this manufacturer is a very popular company for this item. They also sell this at bestbuy. So I believed the reliability of this manufacturer. And I found that this is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the BEST. there are so many great safety features
customer_reviews.text: I have searched MANY cams. This is by far the BEST. there are so many great safety features. The front and REAR cameras are great, Have TWO, one for each vehicle. Use it daily. Would not be without. Great quality, price. arrived on time.Highly recommmend this item.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best Dash Camera on the market. From- South Korea. Record 9 months without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Borodin

customer_reviews.title: Easy and straightforward
customer_reviews.text: I love my think ware cameras, only thing about this one compared to my x500 is that the GPS antenna is no longer internal... not a huge deal just had to find somewhere to hide it... no better camera on the market in my opinion!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality, and the video is decent enough than my A118
customer_reviews.text: I choose this over the A119 pro duo due of it has a road safety function. Works pretty good on my cars.
customer_reviews.author: Yifan Huang

customer_reviews.title: Must Have accessory for every vehicle on the road
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Awesome picture quality, easy to use, and invaluable as far as legal documentation and liability are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very compact unit, dosen't distract your line of vision. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good dash cam would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is my second thinkware I like everything about this dash cam,I like all the features that this dash cam have.
customer_reviews.author: herman rice

customer_reviews.title: Really, really good dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Superb video quality, and easy to review the videos with the app
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Look at all the fake reviews. Vine review? ...
customer_reviews.text: Look at all the fake reviews. Vine review? What the heck is that. I quit looking after the first 5 that were not even verified purchase. This camera is a piece of junk!!
customer_reviews.author: WardnTX

customer_reviews.title: Got two good years out of it
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these in October of 2015, and it's been performing reasonably well, although catching plates on the move or basically anywhere not right up on them is basically not possible. But recently it's started to just shut off and turn back on again repeatedly. It's probably just old and tired (I've kept it plugged in to the "always on" 12V socket on my dash--always meant to hardwire it but I never found the time or inclination), and for the low price of free I can't complain. I did get a Thinkware rear camera to go with it though, and I think I'll probably upgrade to the F800--and actually hardwire that one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD DASHCAM
customer_reviews.text: Thinkware X500 Full HD. This cam is better than what I was expecting. I hardwireded mine so that it stays running in parking mode. Easy to use and transfer video files to my laptop. You can go into the camera and use the settings to set everything from volume, alerts, sensitivity and format the SD memory card. Clear and stable video recording. I would recommend this to anyone looking to purchase a DASHCAM.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Software is pretty good, but my main gripe is the video ...
customer_reviews.text: Software is pretty good, but my main gripe is the video quality. When viewing video footage, I literally can not read the license plate number of a car stopped directly in front of me at a red light, even when zoomed in at 2x magnification. I can't believe this is "Full HD".
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER (OTHER THAN WARNING/ALERT SOUND WARNINGS MEANING)
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been great. The video recordings/night vision are crystal clear. I would highly recommend. On another note, the warning/alert sounds information is no where to be found as to their different meanings.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. North

product_meta.title: THINKWARE X700 Car Dash Cam 1080P FHD 140°Wide Angle Dashboard Camera Recorder for Cars with G-Sensor, Car Camera w/Sony Sensor, Night Vision, Loop Recording, 16GB, Optional Parking Mode and GPS
feature_bullets: SONY STARVIS: Crystal-clear high quality footage captured in Full HD 1080P, 30FPS, 142.7° wide viewing angle
2.7 INCH LCD TOUCHSCREEN: Instantly play back videos, navigate menus, and configure settings right on the screen
ADVANCED DRIVER ASSISTANCE SYSTEM (ADAS): Alerts the driver of potential forward collisions, lane departures, and front vehicle departures
SUPER NIGHT VISION: Advanced technology that reduces noise and enhances image quality in low-light conditions
INTEGRATED THERMAL PROTECTION: Built-in Super capacitors and Thermal Sensor provides additional dash cam safety and reliability in extreme temperatures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Adhesive Cable Clips, Quick start guide/warranty, Thinkware 16GB microSD card with SD adapter
